abstract: United Auto Workers approves new four-year contract with the Ford Motor Company.
snippet: The union ratified its proposed contract with Ford after members at two assembly plants in Kentucky approved the accord.
lead_paragraph: The union ratified its proposed contract with Ford after members at two assembly plants in Kentucky approved the accord.

headline.main: United Auto Workers Approve a New Four-Year Contract With Ford Motor
headline.print_headline: United Auto Workers Approve a New Four-Year Contract With Ford Motor
headline.seo: Ford Contract With Union is Ratified
